'''Michael Deacon''' ([[6 March|March 6]], [[1937]] - [[26 December|December 26]], [[2000]]) was a British actor. He was the voice of [[Gríma|Gríma Wormtongue]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)]].
